content: for this beanie i used some yarn i had at home which is not from a commercial brand 50% wool 50% acrylic any wool that will obtain gauge will be fine you will need 50g of black 25g of white and 25g of grey even if the gauge won t fit perfectly it shouldn t be a problem now available in both adult and child size the main value of this pattern is the empire symbol that forms on the top of the hat a touch that i think can t be found in any other place enjoy your knitting
